page.title: 03Fermyn Woods Hall
page.content: Mrs. Maxwell (b 1919) inherited the Hall from her father Capt Belville. She has two children and twin grandchildren aged 16 months. Her father was in the army and her mother was a nurse with Edith Cavell. The Hall was purchased in 1925 and Mrs. Maxwell hopes that her family, if they can afford it, will inherit it after her. If not, then it will have to be sold. Fermyn Hall covers 348 acres of land and the fields are leased to neighbouring farmers for grass keeping. Her horses graze there in the summer and are used for hunting in the {Woodland Pytchley Hunt.}For extra revenue TV companies have used the grounds for location shots for three productions{The Sword Divided, Bleak {House and Jane Eyre. }The grounds are loaned for the{Brigstock Horse Trials.
